archiefmat.titel: Stukken betreffende de aanvraag van schenking en eigendom aan de gouverneur van Suriname
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents related to the request of donation and ownership sent to the Governor of Suriname
archiefmat.notes:
The description in the inventory is not correct. No. 1543 contains documents from the 1790s; no. 1544 contains information on the administration of justice in the districts in the 1840s.

The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
